body_html: An update - to run inference, I am now using tf.get_variable to initialize the model parameters (randomly), and am then overwriting the values for each parameter with the learned model loaded using tf.train.import_meta_graph(). Clearly a workaround and sub-optimal, but necessary given the situation.
